achievements.title: Member Secretary, Student Council, VIT
achievements.description: Served as Member Secretary of the Student Council at Vellore Institute of Technology in the academic year 2024-25, leading various student initiatives and events.

achievements.title: Karnataka U-1700 State Amateur Chess Champion)
achievements.description: Held the title of Karnataka U-1700 State Amateur Chess Champion in 2019, which was conducted in Bengaluru.

achievements.title: Karate Black Belt Ni-Dan (2nd Black Belt)
achievements.description: Completed over 8+ years of Karate training, achieving the rank of Ni-Dan (2nd Black Belt) in 2018 in the Kokino Shito Ryu Karate School of India.

achievements.title: 11th International Rank in Silverzone Aptitude Olympiad (iRAO)
achievements.description: Achieved the 11th International Rank in the Silverzone Aptitude Olympiad (iRAO) in 2018.

achievements.title: VIT Premier League (Chess) Title Holder
achievements.description: I have won the VIT Premier League (Chess) title three times in a row, in 2023, 2024, and 2025.

achievements.title: School Head Boy
achievements.description: Served as the School Head Boy, leading student initiatives and representing the student body.
